actions.name: Dynamogenesis
actions.description: Effect: The target loses a Tick of HP and a Tick of PP, which the user then gains. The user may spend 7 PP to gain another Simple Action, once per Activation. When a creature is KO'ed in Range of the user, the user gains a Tick of PP.

actions.name: Dynamogensis
actions.description: Passive: the user possesses additional PP, equal to 12 + CEIL(Level / 4). While the user has 50% or more of its PP remaining, they possess the Pure Blooded and Venom Abilities. If the user is an Eternamax Eternatus, they also possess the Ability Exploit Weakness.
